titleStmt.title: The first sermon, preached to the Honourable House of Commons now assembled in Parliament at their publique fast. Novemb. 17. 1640. / By Cornelius Burges Doctor of Divinitie. Published by order of that House.
titleStmt.author: Burges, Cornelius, 1589?-1665.
Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.L. for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith, at the signe of the Golden Lion in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The epistle dedicatory signed: Cornelius Burges. Stephen Marshall.
P. 80 is in at least 3 settings: 1). Without colophon and errata on p. 80; 2). With errata on p. 80; 3). With colophon and errata on p. 80. Cf. Jeffs. English Revolution, v.1, p.3.
Variant: lacking comma after "sermon" on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Golden Lion in Pauls Church-yard
